slide1.title: Great homes begin with great relationships.
slide1.subtitle: Throughout the design process, we collaborate with you to gain an understanding of your unique needs.

slide2.title: New way of living.
slide2.subtitle: Change the way you live life, closer to nature. To love where you live.

slide3.title: Efficient journey from start to finish.
slide3.subtitle: We are committed to providing you with a seamless experience from start to finish.

introduction.title: Driven by Design.
introduction.subtitle: 3E Design is a group of architects, designers and engineers committed to sustainable, innovative and practical residential architecture.

projects.title: Get Inspired.
projects.subtitle: Browse our highlighted projects to see how we can help you create your dream home.

expertise.title: What we do.
expertise.subtitle: We create spaces for you that resonate.
expertise.cta: See what we are working on

expertise1.title: Architecture
expertise1.description: We design architecture that is both functional and beautiful. We work with you to create a space that is unique to you and your needs.

expertise2.title: Interior
expertise2.description: We create interiors with style, unconventional and authentic.

expertise3.title: Landscape
expertise3.description: We provide landscape design with a process of shaping the land to create a beautiful and functional space.

feature.title: Not sure what to expect?
feature.subtitle: Here are some features for you at a glance.

feature1.title: Work with heart
feature1.description: We are passionate about what we do and we are committed to our clients.

feature2.title: Professional team
feature2.description: Working as an independent creative in close collaboration with a dedicated set-up team.

feature3.title: Taylored to you
feature3.description: Designing is not looking at your neighbor. We are all unique people and we need unique spaces.

feature4.title: Fast Process
feature4.description: Fast and efficient process from the first contact to the final delivery of the project.

feature5.title: Stay on track
feature5.description: Deliver on time and on budget. We are committed to our clients and we are always on time.

feature6.title: Happy clients
feature6.description: We put our clients first and we are always happy to see them happy.
